abstract: New York Road Runners Club expands their Mobile Spectator App so that fans can track runners competing in the New York City Marathon on Nov 6; app includes countdown clocks, leader boards, video and the ability to find live music on the course.
snippet: Spectators can track runners with the phone application for the Nov. 6 New York City Marathon. They also can use it to find live music or food on the course.
lead_paragraph: Spectators can track runners with the phone application for the Nov. 6 New York City Marathon. They also can use it to find live music or food on the course.

headline.main: A Phone App to Keep Fans in Touch
headline.print_headline: A Phone App to Keep Fans in Touch
headline.seo: For New York City Marathon’s Fans, a Cellphone App to Keep in Touch
